sentences.sContent: If you can hear my benison.
sentences.sCn: 如果你能听见我的祝祷。

sentences.sContent: If you are admired by your success, my benison is warmly and hortative contemplation traversing congested crowd.
sentences.sContent_eng: If you are admired by your success, my benison is warmly and hortative contemplation traversing congested crowd.
sentences.sCn: 假若你成功受景仰，那麽我的祝福就是穿越拥挤的人群给你温暖鼓历的注视；

sentences.sContent: If you are admired by your success, my benison is warmly and hortative contemplation traversing congested crowd.
sentences.sContent_eng: If you are admired by your success, my benison is warmly and hortative contemplation traversing congested crowd.
sentences.sCn: 假若你成功受景仰，那么我的祝福就是穿越拥挤的人群给你温暖鼓历的注视；

remMethod.val: 和pension (n. 养老金) 一起记

trans.tranOther: a blessing, esp a spoken one
